wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Reid was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a full back. He played a total of twelve games in the Football League for Burnley and Bradford Park Avenue.

response: Andy Reid (born 1958) is the head coach of the Kansas City Chiefs of the NFL.
*Andy Reid (Scottish footballer), footballer of the 1920s and 1930s
*Andy Reid (running back) (born 1954), American football running back
